block.p: Gini Kopecky, a magazine editor, and Marc Wallace, a freelance writer and producer of television documentaries, were married last evening in Upper Black Eddy, Pa. Rabbi Richard F. Steinbrink officiated at the Manor House restaurant.

Ms. Kopecky, 51, will continue to use her name professionally. She is a senior editor at Family Circle magazine in New York and a co-author of ''Do They Hear You When You Cry'' (Delacorte Press, 1998), a nonfiction book. She graduated from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. She is a daughter of the late Helen and Anton Kopecky, who lived in Cicero, Ill.
